name: iLectronz
description:
iNCEPTIONAL presents iLectronz.

iLectronz is a highly addictive retro style arcade action game that requires precise hand-eye coordination and super fast reflexes. It's a bit like playing a vertical game of Pac-Man but a little bit different.

It’s easy to pick up and play but difficult to truly master.

*****

User Reviews

“Another classic up there with the likes of Doodle Jump and Tetris” – CDreams

“Awesome game, very simple control but incredibly addictive.” – idfisher

“It’s highly addictive and superbly polished” – David Murdoch

“Great fun and very addictive. Looks fantastic too. Highly Recommended!” – Tdgumble

“You get that moment in all great and simple games, where you realise that some new part of your brain is being given a workout.” – Edward Sludden

*****

Note: Optimised for iPhone 4s and above.
